text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
As I approach the training course, I<n>spy Vodka talking to
another student.

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text:
C'mon, you and me—let's race fair<n>and square! I don't
need no head<n>start!

text_block_list.name: Classmate
text_block_list.text:
Vodka's been challenging the seniors<n>to races left and right
these days... I<n>wonder what's gotten into her.

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text:
Here we go, last corner! It's make or<n>break time—and I'm
gonna caaatch<n>uuup!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
However, despite being in hot pursuit<n>of her opponent, she
fails to close the<n>distance.

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: Pant... pant... Well, I'll let youhave this one...

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text:
But it won't happen again! I'm gonna<n>leave all you pace
chasers in the dust,<n>so watch out! The soon-to-be world's<n>
coolest racer is comin' after ya!

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text:
(Aw yeah, I'm so cool! Now everyone<n>knows that no matter
how many times<n>I lose, I'm gonna get back up and<n>keep
goin'!)

text_block_list.name: Older Student
text_block_list.text:
Okay, whatever you say. You're cute<n>when you're so
hyped up. Anyway,<n>catch ya later.

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text:
Hell yeah! Wait a sec... Aren't you<n>intimidated at all? Like, I
have hidden<n>powers, y'know! Hey!

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text:
Hey, Trainer, I wanna talk to you<n>about something. Did you
catch my<n>race just now?

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text:
I was all like, "I'm gonna leave you in<n>the dust!" to be super
cool, but...

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text:
Now that I think about it, wasn't that<n>kinda lame? I bet all
the seniors think<n>I'm just a kid with a big mouth.

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text:
Honestly, it sounds like something a<n>clichéd villain would
say. Like, "You<n>haven't seen the last of me!"

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text:
You serious?! Oh man, it wasn't like<n>this before I entered
the academy. For<n>starters, losing in a race wasn't a<n>thing
for me...

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text:
But Tracen's got tons of talented<n>folks, so of course I'd
lose on<n>occasion. And every time it happens, I<n>can't help
but feel sore about it.
choice_data_list:
What if you tried not saying anything
afterwards?

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text:
Yeah, I suppose. I could give that a<n>try. All right, lemme do a
quick practice<n>sesh.

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text:
Ahem, ahem... Okay, here I go. "Heh,<n>looks like I lost. I
accept my defeat.<n>See you later."

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: .........But I'm gonna get ya next time!<n>I'll utterly destroy you!

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text:
Ughhh, I came off as an actual villain<n>this time! How the hell
do people<n>casually accept defeat and move on?!

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: ...Sorry. I think I'm gonna go. This is<n>pathetic...

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: As Vodka hurries off, I quickly follow<n>behind her.

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text:
Sorry, Trainer. Didn't mean to worry<n>you. It's just... I don't
know what<n>being "cool" even is anymore.

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text:
It's good that I'm facing tough<n>opponents head-on, but I'm
starting to<n>wonder if I should be dropping<n>one-liners.
choice_data_list:
Do you always feel like you need to say
something?

Do you always feel like you need to say
something?

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text:
It just comes out on its own! I... got it<n>from my pops. He'd
always say stuff<n>like "you're lacking heart," or "looks<n>like
you're only second best."

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text:
He was the one who taught me that<n>it's cool to drop
one-liners after a<n>match.

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text:
But if I don't win, it's kinda lame. I<n>don't wanna be all talk
and no show.<n>That's why I need your help, Trainer!

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: Can you teach me what itactually means to be cool? You're the only one who knows howcool I really am.

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: Do you think you can help me grow<n>even more?

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text:
Thanks! Just knowing that you're by<n>my side makes me
feel a lot better!<n>I'm gonna discover what it means to<n>be
genuinely cool. Oh and...

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text:
I-I'll also need help to overcome my<n>weakness. Y'know...
whenever I see<n>lovey-dovey romantic stuff, I get<n>shivers
down my spine.

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text:
I'm not sayin' I'm embarrassed<n>though! Don't you dare
get me wrong.<n>You better not tell anyone else about<n>this,
or else I'll send ya flyin'!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Before Vodka turns around and<n>rushes off, I manage to
catch a<n>glimpse of her flushed cheeks.
